job.title: Full Stack Developer with C#/.NET + Angular Skills
job.description:
We are seeking a Full Stack Developer with strong expertise in Angular and C#/.NET to design, develop, and implement software solutions that meet our clients' needs. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of software development life cycles, be proficient in both frontend and backend technologies, and be able to work collaboratively in a team environment.

Responsibilities:
Design and develop scalable web applications using Angular and C#/.NET.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze requirements, design solutions, and integrate systems.
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
Maintain and improve existing software, and develop new features to enhance user experience.
Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and troubleshooting to ensure robust and efficient code.
Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends to incorporate into development practices.

Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with expertise in Angular and C#/.NET.
Strong understanding of web development technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
Experience with .NET Core, Entity Framework, and SQL Server.
Familiarity with RESTful API development and integration.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
Good communication and interpersonal skills.

Nice to Have:
Experience with cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
Knowledge of Agile methodologies and DevOps practices.
Certifications in relevant technologies.

questions.question: Tell me about your test-driven development experience.
Include a link to your GitHub profile and/or website

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are seeking a Full Stack Developer with strong skills in C#/.NET and Angular. This is a long-term project, with a duration of more than 6 months. The ideal candidate should have experience in .NET Framework, AI App Development, AI Development, Angular, C#, and ASP.NET MVC.

As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using C#/.NET and Angular. You will work closely with the development team to design, code, and test new features and enhancements. 

To apply for this position, please submit a detailed proposal describing how you can contribute to this project. Please include links to your past completed projects that demonstrate your expertise in C#/.NET and Angular.

We look forward to reviewing your proposals and finding the right candidate for this exciting opportunity.
